DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of the pertussis component of DTwP (whole-cell pertussis containing vaccine) when administered concomitantly with RotaTeq™ or Rotatrix™.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Immunogenicity and Safety of Whole-Cell Pertussis Containing Vaccine Administered Concomitantly With RotaTeq™ (V260) or Rotarix™ (V260-036)(WITHDRAWN)
DOC.criteria: Healthy infants History of abdominal disorders, intestinal folding, or abdominal surgery Impaired immune system Prior administration of any rotavirus vaccine or DTwP/DTaP Fever of >= 38.1C (100.5F) at the time of vaccination History of prior rotavirus infection, chronic diarrhea, or failure to thrive Evidence of active gastrointestinal illness
